example.title: Output: config.php
example.programlisting:
get - MyConfigVar1 'value cfg1'
get - MyConfigVar2 'value cfg2'
get - MyConfigVar3 'value cfg3'
exists - MyConfigVar1 true
exists - MyConfigVar2 true
exists - MyConfigVar3 true
exists - xx false
get - MyConfigVar1 - changed1 'value cfg1'
get - MyConfigVar2 - changed1 'value cfg2'
get - MyConfigVar3 - changed1 'value cfg3'
get - MyConfigVar1 - changed2 'value cfg1 changed'
get - MyConfigVar2 - changed2 'value cfg2 changed'
get - MyConfigVar3 - changed2 'value cfg3 changed'
YDConfig contents array ( 'YD_EXECUTOR' => 'YDExecutor', 'YD_DEBUG' => 0, 'MyConfigVar1' => 'value cfg1 changed', 'MyConfigVar2' => 'value cfg2 changed', 'MyConfigVar3' => 'value cfg3 changed', )
